title: Two new Vice Chancellors appointed
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); New Vice Chancellors have been appointed for the Eastern University and the Gampaha Wickramarachchi University of Indigenous Medicine.

Accordingly, Prof. M.S. Selvarajah has been appointed a the new Vice Chancellor of Eastern University, while Prof. R. Wickrama Seneviratne of the Ruhuna University Medical Faculty has been appointed as the Vice Chancellor of the Gampaha Wickramarachchi University of Indigenous Medicine.
